content: Reminder: the early bird deadline for FHIR DevDays November 2020 (virtual edition, 17 to 20 November) expires on October 31. We have special rates for students and for participants from low and middle income countries. More details on speakers, sessions and registration, please visit the website: https://www.devdays.com/november-2020/.

Hello @Rien Wertheim , a couple of questions....

A. Is VAT applicable for participants from US?
B. If I attended the June DevDays, is there any special pricing for repeat attendees?

Thank you.

Please, no discussions on the announcements channel. You are referred to the #DevDays Support channel for detailed discussions or questions related to DevDays. (an no, VAT doesn't apply if you're located outside of the EU (and UK))
